reviews.review_msg: This was a great class. I recommend taking any course with Yildiz. She is one of the best profs I have had at SFU. She is a fair marker, cares about her students and she creates a unique learning environment by making her students feel comfortable to engage in class discussion.
If you have the opportunity to take a course with her you'll be amazed, best SA prof I've had at SFU. She is engaging and the course ware is heavy but rewarding.
She is great a prof and very passionate about the subject. She grades fairly and classes were never boring.
